title: Central A/C & Heating, Courtyard view, Wood-Grain Finish Flooring
posting_body: The five-story Graham features a collection of intimate studio, one, two, and three-bedroom residences showcasing contemporary finishes and details.
Alexander Graham Bell, the scientist, engineer, and innovator who invented and patented the first telephone, inspires the building’s name.

Inventive works of art influenced by algorithmic formulas accent the community, a fitting tribute to this luminary genius of computer science.,The five-story Graham features a collection of intimate studio, one, two, and three-bedroom residences showcasing contemporary finishes and details.
Alexander Graham Bell, the scientist, engineer, and innovator who invented and patented the first telephone, inspires the building’s name.
Inventive works of art influenced by algorithmic formulas accent the community, a fitting tribute to this luminary genius of computer science.
